price: Wͻnte nsεm hunu anaa nkontomposεm biara wͻ hͻ,
arabic: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّٰبٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhāban
